Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Frank Johnson
Reviews.Content: Show some feedback on this nice tv I purchased. It did arrive broken. Screen cracked and destroyed. Contacted amazon. They instantly shipped out a replacement and I'm please to say it better than I thought it would be. Perfect size phenomenal picture and the games look unbelievable. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Amazon button works, but defective TV
Reviews.Author: Stiff "SCG"
Reviews.Content: First, the picture is terrific from DirecTV...except for a thin, bright greenish horizontal line about 1/3 up the screen from the bottom.  The line appeared on first start-up of the set.  Called Vizio and must say the customer support was very good.  They saw where I'd registered the set on-line using its internet connection.  They asked for pictures of the set showing the issue.  That took a couple of tries, but once they saw it, the volunteered to replace it.  So that I don't have to go weeks with no TV in the bedroom, I agreed to the option where they put a charge on my credit card, send the replacement, after it arrives I box up the "old" one and return it.  Then the charge is refunded to the card.  Meanwhile, the TV is serviceable enough.  Other than the defect, the picture is excellent.  As my wife pointed out, if we'd made the purchase from a brick-and-mortar store, the exchange of sets would have probably taken an hour.Some other comments about the "A" version stated that the Amazon button on the remote didn't work.  On this one, the "B" variant, the Amazon button worked perfectly, and after logging into Prime from my laptop and getting the code to register the new TV, my Prime account is accessible with one click.So, yes, I would have preferred that the TV be perfect right out of the container, but I'm pleased so far with the customer support response

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Rini
Reviews.Content: We researched many TV's till we found the one we wanted. This had great reviews already and after looking at it in the stores, found a much better price for it here on Amazon. It came much faster than what we were initially told. It was in perfect shape, got it set up very quickly and are happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: I bought it specifically because it offered good framerate interpolation
Reviews.Author: Seth Andrew Martin
Reviews.Content: Stupendous TV. I bought it specifically because it offered good framerate interpolation, and it does an excellent job with that. The picture is exceptional as well. I'm not a detailed expert on the finer points of picture, but I can tell a good one from a not as good one, and this TV is among the best I've seen. I also didn't plan on using any of the smart features at all, since it's connected to a full HTPC, but the Smart interface is so good sometimes I just use it cause it's easier.

Reviews.Title: Visio E390i-BO rates high
Reviews.Author: Alan J. Adler
Reviews.Content: Reluctant to buy a TV on line but had seen this TV at a local retailer and was impressed with the picture and the value. We were very pleased with the fast delivery and the set meets our full expectations.

Reviews.Title: Best Purchase on Amazon
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Walter
Reviews.Content: This tv is the best bang for your buck. Period. Super dark black and excellent picture not to mention to 120hz refresh for future proof. Seriously if your in the market for a 39 inch look no further.

Reviews.Title: Great TV value for the price!
Reviews.Author: Cindy Maigatter
Reviews.Content: The TV worked great right out of the box with few adjustments.  We are very happy with the picture quality and sound is fine for our needs.  The remote is small and the buttons could be bigger but it's easy to use once you learn where the buttons are.

Reviews.Title: It is differently worth every dollar!
Reviews.Author: Rhonda
Reviews.Content: We love it my husband bought it for himself and he and our 6 year old grandson are amazed by it clear picture and perfect sound. Still cannot get connect to amazon but all other features work perfectly.Our entire family enjoys watch our favorite shows on this tv

Reviews.Title: Vizio 39" 120 hz TV
Reviews.Author: Ronald G. Novak
Reviews.Content: Very enjoyable to watch. I am very pleased with the overall construction and design. Hope I never need theextra warranty purchased but better safe than sorry.  Highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: great functionality
Reviews.Author: Leticia Nelson
Reviews.Content: more user friendly than the samsung picture is not the best only when a device is plugged innot bad though

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Patty S.
Reviews.Content: This the third Vizio tv that I have purchased-all for different rooms.  I really like the way it looks and works.  The only issue I had was that I couldn't get my son to install it the day I got it.

Reviews.Title: SMART TV ROKS
Reviews.Author: Mercedes
Reviews.Content: awesome, clear picture. easy to put together. light in weight, easy to move around if needed. i love the smart features

Reviews.Title: A decent tv, smart apps are a big plus
Reviews.Author: SRHadden "SRHadden"
Reviews.Content: Not a bad tv.  Even though it says 120Hz, it doesn't give you that super-realistic refresh rate that I expected. Some people like that, some hate it.  The "smart" part is improved. The amazon prime videos works well, which is the one thing missing from apple tv.  Decent tv.

Reviews.Title: Execellent TV, OK UI
Reviews.Author: Tye
Reviews.Content: The TV is a great buy! The picture is good, the dark scenes are not blown out, and the image is super sharp. The built in speakers are OK, but what I expected. The user interface takes some getting used to and it can be complicated at times (and Im an Engineer). I would recommend this TV to anyone!

Reviews.Title: poor sound quality
Reviews.Author: Tyson Miller
Reviews.Content: Sounds like your in a tunnel. The speakers system is very poor it doesn't feel like the sound is even coming from the tv, it's bouncing off the wall then back to you.

Reviews.Title: Disgusted with Vizio.
Reviews.Author: leery
Reviews.Content: This tv worked for 2 days before experiencing a black screen with audio.. Vizio told me to change the HDMI cable, II changed the cable and tv was no problem for 5 days. Now every day the black screen with audio shows up and I have to turn tv off and back on again to get a picture and only had tv for 4 weeks. Vizio service is giving me the run around about the cable box which is brand new and was checked out by Cablevision. Do yourself a favor and by a Samsung like I should've of.

Reviews.Title: A Great TV At A Decent Price (Updated 2/20/14)
Reviews.Author: Monicabrou
Reviews.Content: My original review was based on the item arriving broken/damaged after it arrived late.  Amazon did send out a replacement (it too arrive late) but onthe upside when it was all said and done this set worked.  After receiving one that was damaged I did scour the internet looking for similar issues andthere were many to be found.  However, this is about the TV not the ineptitude of shipping services,Packaging:  The box is sturdy and the foam for the top and bottom were thick but I feel they should of had a better bufferto protect the screen and back (there is a tiny 1/4" foam piece but does not really add to the safety)Setup:  Took no more than 5 minutes and it was up and running, doing the initial TV setup took about another 5 to 10 minutesto connect it to the WiFi and setup the apps.TV:  Great picture, awesome blacks, and vivid colors.  Tested it on several Blu-Rays and several HD streams of TV.  The sound is okay, it isbetter than most flat panel TVs but it's decent.The Apps:  The Apps take a bit to load and execute but there is a wide variety to be found.  One reviewer said the Amazon Video app was not workingthey must of fixed it as mine worked well.  There is no PLEX app yet but according to their 2014 CES announcement an app is coming soon forthose using media servers in their house like myself.The Remote:  It is okay nothing to write home about it has 3 fast access buttons for Amazon / Netflix / M/GO but I wish it was backlit.

Reviews.Title: Not what it seems
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am disappointed in my choice in television.  I have wireless and Netflix stops every five minutes.  Most importantly Amazon is not on, my main purpose was to use the television as a wider screen then my laptop and using my kindle mainly for reading.  I know I have to reorientate my furniture to maximize the usage of my network and wait patiently for Amazon to be uploaded on this brand. I previously returned one that was all cracked up on the inside, I should had just stuck with my original Samsung.  The model I bought seem more advanced but the consumer could not tell because the year it came out was not indicated on all the televisions.  Again a poor choice in decision making.

Reviews.Title: Wish I didnt buy it
Reviews.Author: charlie
Reviews.Content: the tv wouldn't come on with the remote, I chose to call Vizio and see if I could get a fix,  the first person I talked to determined it was the tv causing the problem,  I had to call back again and this person determined it was the remote itself, to long of a problem to get into,  hours of frustrating being on the phone and I have to wait up to two weeks to get a replacement remote,  Im not sure but I think the problem is with the tv, but with no choice I will wait for the replacement remote to see if the people at vizio guessed right, people,  buy the tv at a store where you can get some satisfaction, wish I knew how to get hold of amazon and let them know about the problem,

Reviews.Title: Not what I was hoping for.
Reviews.Author: N. Carlow
Reviews.Content: This is a nice tv.  It was easy to set up; took it out of the box, hit a few buttons and all set. My biggest complaint is that Amazon Instant Video is not currently available on this tv.  While there is an actual button labeled Amazon on the remote and one of the listed apps on the tv is Amazon Instant Video, I was told by Amazon customer service that the app is currently being worked on for this device.  Big disappointment so far!

Reviews.Title: Product Cracked
Reviews.Author: Michael Fox
Reviews.Content: As I have seen in other reviews, the TV was cracked upon arrival.  This must happen too often.  I will order another it's a good price.

ProductInfo.Features:
1. VIZIO Internet Apps Plus - Instantly enjoy the latest hit movies, TV shows, music and even more premium apps straight from the Internet to your TV.
2. Full-Array LED backlight - Distributes LEDs across the entire screen delivering superior light uniformity and picture performance.
3. Active LED Zones x6- Dynamically adjusts the LED backlight per zone creating deeper, pure black levels and higher contrast.
4. Built-in Wi-Fi - Connect with high-speed wireless for easy, clutter-free Internet access.
5. 120Hz effective refresh rate enhanced with backlight scanning - Enjoy clear fast action scenes.
ProductInfo.Name: VIZIO E390i-B0 39-Inch 1080p 120Hz Smart LED HDTV
